title: An Adversarial Robust Behavior Sequence Anomaly Detection Approach Based on Critical Behavior Unit Learning
summary: Sequential deep learning models (e.g., RNN and LSTM) can learn the sequence features of software behaviors, such as API or syscall sequences. However, recent studies have shown that these deep learning-based approaches are vulnerable to adversarial samples.
